name: Tukalda
content: Tukalda was an Abednedo female who was the neighbor of Norra Wexley and Wedge Antilles in the city of Myrra on the planet Akiva. Tukalda took a dislike to Wexley after the two found political differences during a community dinner party. When Resistance X-wings were landed outside Wexley's home, Tukalda reported the sighting to the First Order, but, when things escalated and Wedge and Norra fought the guards, Norra instantly knocked Tukalda out with a punch to the head. After the fight, the couple decided to gag and tie up Tukalda before throwing her in with the dead First Order officers.
